this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: ConnectScopeToOrigin path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/cdn/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/scopes/{scope_id}/origins content: params

in path
required true
schema
type str
sum connect an origin to a scope
desc the origin is automatically created if necessary when the request contains a priority which an origin already associated with the scope has set the existing origin is disconnected the priority of an origin already associated with a scope can be modified via this endpoint

desc the http port to connect to the origin
secureport

desc the https port to connect to the origin
desc a new origin
priority
type integer
format int32
desc the origins priority to the scope

if a cdn scope is powered by more than one origin then the one with the lower priority number takes higher precedence
originid
type str
desc the id of an existing origin to associate with a scope

this is useful for connecting to a shared origin
